content.detailedDescription: I was outside of my house when my son called who was driving and told me to go up on our garage roof deck and look at the strange lights moving west to south. earlier this evening i observed the same type of light, only one due east of our house but never really stopped to take a good look at that time which was around 6:35pm but did see a fixed wing aircraft moving at a fast speed towards the light which was followed by a military looking  helicopter moving and turning towards the same single light which took off up thru the cloud cover over the mountains due ne of my house. the lights at 8pm which my wife and my son who was driving saw had orange and yellow color in formation and turned from going west to south and kept going.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observation of individual lights in formation

content.detailedDescription:
I had been jogging/running around a .5 mile circular road in the over 55 senior mobile home community that i moved into in 1996. i saw this what seemed to be tricked out blimp type craft made up to look like the space ship from close encounters of the third kind (the movie) and thought that that was what it must be. it was shaped just like a blimp but glowing a beautiful mellow yellow/orange with a line of lights on the top, on the bottom, and at the mid-line. it made no sound whatsoever. i stood still watching it for at least a good 5-10 minutes as it silently moved off into the distance and disappeared. i am still under the impression that this thing was some sort of tricked out blimp on the way over to the disney world/universal studios/epcot area. i thought that i had heard something on the radio(or possibly tv news)  to the affect that such a craft had been created by disney for promotional purposes. now, many years latter i am not real sure about that part.When i asked someone in the park if he had seen the space ship he started to ridicule me with the usual kind of taunt that one might encounter with the suggestion that i was crazy. 

i was very impressed with the glow of this thing and how the entire blimp like craft just seemed to glow this very beautiful orange color. i never bother to check the local newspapers or news reports to see if this was in fact some sort of fantastically tricked out blimp being used for promotional purposes by the attractions in orlando. 

i would very much like to know what this craft was.
content.summary: I saw this glowing blimp type craft at night while out running.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on i-90 eastbound on the east side of cleveland oh near the town of mentor oh.  i and my passenger saw a bright (intensity of lighting)bluish / white ball of light develop off in front of us at an unknown distance.  to do my best guess, it was maybe 1/4 mile... but it could have been 50 miles.  it was hard to determine.
   the ball shaped object immediately caught both of our attention, and stayed sort of a pulsating ball for maybe 4 seconds.  then, the ball remained, but a perfectly shaped "v" ray of light shot to the sky, and then it went out.
   both i an my passenger both said holy @#$% what was that... at exactly the same time.  there were numerous cars on i-90, and i know they saw it too in that many of us hit the brakes on our cars at the same time.
    my first thought was the the nuclear power plant (perry electric plant) had exploded.  my second thought was some sort of nuclear explosion happened way off in the distance, and there was some sort of terror attact.  my 3rd, 4th, & 5th thoughts were it was some weird lighting (no storm and clear night) or gasoline truck accident (none found), or electrical transformer explosion (have seen those before, and not the same).  so, i dont know what it was, and i can not venture a guess.
   i felt scared, because i know there is a nuclear reactor near there, and the possibility of terrorism.
   the object just disappated like a light turning off.  

    as for the next question ... # of witnesses... i know about 8 cars in front of me all hit their brakes at the same time.  i stopped 2 exits ahead for gas, and ran into a husband and wife who saw the same thing.  they couldnt explain it either.  so i dont know how to answer that question.  there were 2 or 3 (my son was sleeping in the back) who saw it in my car, plus many others on the highway.
content.summary: An intense bluish ball of light that started as a ball then changed to a

content.detailedDescription: I took out the trash and looked up in the eastern sky to see a red light go across the sky. i saw a plane flying alot lower in the southern sky. i looked east at watched as the red light stopped in mid-air at a white point. the red and white flashed or pulsated and it seemed like the white light went in and out of the red light. i got the ipad to see what constellations were in the sky. the report said it was where betelgeuse is. this would make sense except i know i saw the red light travel horizonatally across the sky and stop.
content.summary: Saw this light go across the sky and stop at a white point of light.

content.detailedDescription: Ok i and a friend had been exploring some mining sites in the elpaso mtn in kern county california, we had stopped at about 1630hrs to eat when i noticed a red light appear on hillside about 3/4 of a mile away but it went out and i did not think about. once we finished eating i cleaned up the site put everything back into vehicle and prepared to leave, my friend wanted to stay awhile to see the stars, at about 20:15 the red light again appeared on the hillside but moving across the hill, when it went vertical over the crest of the hill top (5400) moved toward the center of a saddle and came to a hover.I new this was going to be interesting,a second object appeared from the direction of connecting hill and joined the first object in a hover. while my attention was on the two objects in front of me my friend told me to look at what was happening to my right, this is weird i am looking at 4 columns of 4 evenly spaced red lights that are blinking from top to bottom and from bottom to top and sequentially from my right to left with 2-6 bright white lights at the base moving in step with the columns. now all this is going on there is no noise, and after 25min of this show everything close's down leaving just the first object which remained in a hover pulsed 3 times and disappeared!This not the end, this area is now part of the state park system and all trails are now marked like a freeway, my own experience in this area is 20years, but for some reason i could not find my way back to the highway which could be see from this location each time we tried we ended up back at the spot we had left, 5 times over 5 hours finally had to stop fuel was low and were not going anywhere! next day we checked the area for any signs of foul play no sign of human playing games just the desert! how about that, this show was preformed for us at close range, like within a mile and no higher then 6000 ft. this was a first for me and i am impressed.
content.summary: 26 objects appeared to put on a show for 25min then left without saying goodbye

content.detailedDescription: Vessel
content.summary: Vessel

content.detailedDescription: It would be nice if i could access the california mufon site[s].
content.summary: A shape or drape of light, small to huge, falling fast.

content.detailedDescription: I received a call from my father who said there had been a plane crash in wenona md, there were 911 reports calls from residents reporting a plane crash, local news stated that 911 was dispatched but local coast guard refused to dispatch helicopters due to wether conditions (it was raining).  i have relatives who live near the water and they state that they did hear the sounds of a motor that seemed to sputter and then a large crash and splach into the water.  no debris has been found.  no evidence of a crash of any sort or a plane crash has been found as of 1430 1/22/12.  the community is talking about the fact that many people heard this event yet nothing has been found.
content.summary: Residents report hearing a motor type sound and then hearing a crash into the water, no evidence found of any plane crash, coast guard refuses to respond

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i both saw this while playing with our new telescope. now we both know u.F.O.'s exsist but this is something on a whole new level for the both of  us. we are still trying to process this. but here it is.
i had aimed the scope at the moon to have a big object to see and bumped the telescope slightly and that is when it happened, i peered through the view finder, the moon was just out of sight and i could see lights or like a type of pulsating glow as i focused on it more, i was in shock it was the best way to say it a damm train in space! there was a type of lead vessel pulling 15 to 18 other vessel like containers each with a sort of pulsating glow from the bottom of each one after my wife saw them to we couldn't even believe it, tried to explain it rationaly like maybe a reflection of something close by us but nothing would cause what we saw. i now think and i hate to say it but really believe there is a base on the moon being supplied right now.
content.summary: Train/ containment type vessel?

content.detailedDescription: Just a light in the sky is was moving in all ways never seen nothing like it down loaded phone and cam. on computer hit the zoom button can't believe what had .Allso killed my batties in 35 mm cam. 5 times.
content.shape: Cross,   Diamond,   Disc,   Flash,   Oval,   Square,   Rectagular
content.summary: Used a 35 mm camra and took pitures with digital smart phone 2  night s one in july the next was august

content.detailedDescription: While on a balcony in nyc at the corner of 97th and riverside drive, i looked out across the river towards nj and the stonehenge building in james j. braddock park. i observed a small pulsating strobe, extremely bright, fly from north to south (at about the same speed as a jet airliner) and then immediately stop and hover. a few minutes later, another object, much larger and cigar-shaped, flew from south to north (at about the same speed) at an incline to hover about another 5 degrees above and to the north of the first object. there is a large tree across the street and the small pulsating object was aligned with the top of the tree. the first object started out extremely bright white and gradually turned red before winking out. the second object pulsated various colors in a pattern, mostly white, blue and red. altogether, the incident occurred over approximately twenty minutes, from about 6:20pm to 6:40pm on january 20, 2012.
content.summary: Observed 2 objects, 1 a pulsating bright light the other a cigar like shape pulsating various colors

content.detailedDescription: Driving home about 9pm on i43 northbound, 3 of us see a huge white light in the sky over lake michigan. normally we would think this was an airplane or helicopter, but this light was bigger than that and it didn't appear to be moving up, down, or sideways. during this time we were trying to figure out what it was, and within a minute i would say, the light just seemed to burn out to a single point and then vanish. we didn't come to any logical conclusion.
content.summary: Very large bright light. stationary. was over lake michigan. seemed to "burn out" to a single point and then vanish.

content.detailedDescription: On my way to work at 6:35 am i saw a bright light through my windshield. at first i thought it was a reflection of headlights behind me, but i had just checked my mirror and nothing was there. i instantly looked at the light and followed it with my eyes for approx. 2 seconds. i was still driving, so i checked the road ahead of me and looked back but the object was gone. the sun had not come up yet, but it was bright enough for me to see a few small clouds and contrails from commercial aircraft. this object left no visible contrail. i am 44 years old and have seen many shooting stars, jets, planes, etc. this object moved much slower than a shooting star but much faster than a jet. it appeared to be at an altitude similar to small aircraft. it moved west to east. this happened between hastings and elkton fl. on friday jan 20, 2012. i have always been a sky watcher, but i have never seen anything i couldn't explain until now. hopefully this will back another person's observation.
content.summary: Object moved west to east much slower than metoer, much faster than jet

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on the i95 southbound and exited on donald ross rd heading east. as i was waiting at the red light just east of i95, i noticed a very bright white light, thinking at first "that is an odd street light so high up" taking note also that the street light have a "yellowish tinge" to them. i also noticed that it was not moving towards me or away or up or down from me and it was very steady with no blinking lights but very white like a pure white light. as i continued to observe this light, it just "blinked out" literally, there was no after glow when it "blinked out". the traffic signal turned green and i scanned the sky where this was and there was nothing. i arrived home approximately 5 minutes later and tried to make sense of what that was.
content.summary: Bright light in jupiter florida

content.detailedDescription: Glowing, pulsating object over south lake tahoe as seen from minden, nevada in a valley to the east.  appeared as an unusually bright star with erratic pulsating.  through binoculars there appeared to be a red vertical ring that the pulsating light tracked around.  hovered relatively in place with slightly sporadic movements in all directions.  ascending and descending in slight movements.  after about 40 minutes the object appeared to be moving away to the west or fading out of sight over the course of about a minute or so.
content.summary: Glowing object over south lake tahoe

content.detailedDescription: I was driving making a left hand turn on piner rd in santa rosa when my boyfriend said "what is that" and pointed to the sky. i looked up and wax immediately intrigued by a larger triangle formation approximately 300 feet above ground. the lights (three of them) were bluish-white and had a strange glow to them. i knew immediately they were not stars anc they were definitely not an air plane. there was no sound coming from the object at all. after staring in awe for approximately 2 minutes one by one the lights disappeared.
content.summary: Three lights in a triangle formation appeared and then one by one the lights disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was eating dinner with some friends,someone pointed them out. when i saw them i automatically thought of the videos ive seen online of the same thing in other places. 

the objects came into sight from behind some trees that were blocking our view. the moved across the sky some what randomly all at the same speed. slowly they flickered out one by one until there was 3 left. the three were arranged in a isosceles triangle,with the short side parallel with the ground.About a minute later, starting with the top light they slowly went out. 

the location was east of where i was. i assume it was over lake osceola. it could have been flares from a plane. although i have no idea what that looks like.
content.summary: A group of yellowish lights move across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Cloud cover. shoveling snow, whole sky lit up twice a couple of minutes apart, i though it was lightning.  i looked up after the second time and saw three objects moving rapidly through the sky.   light orangish-yellow probably 3-5 miles away.  moving faster than any plane and could perform abrupt turns. did not have blinking light like plane.  made no noise.  i would love to know what this was.
content.summary: 3 lights moving rapidly changing direction

content.detailedDescription:
It happened roughly 4 years ago, in 7th grade. so i dont remember the details very well.

i was on the computer at night in my house within our neighborhood. then my sister & brother came to me & said that there are ufos in the sky. we went to the top the the stairs in the house to look through a window which was above the stairs.

as we looked south towards vancouver wa, there where 3 star-like lights floating in the very far horizon. they moved in synch with each other as if at an air show, moving around strangly & quickly. amazingly, all 3 lights even combined together into one & back apart! they couldnt have been any normal aircraft because of how quickly they moved, & how quickly they changed direction. i lights dissapeared after a few minutes.

sometime after the event, i was at school & told my story. a guy in my class said his dad works in the airforce, he said his dad told that they got calls reporting lights in the sky. they said it was f22 raptor testing.
but i doubt it because the lights where very quick & agile, & even combined.

we video-taped the event, but the video was poor-quality, therefore you couldnt see anything & it was useless.
i recently made a rough picture to show what it looked like.

im curious if anyone else saw it or what it could have been.
content.summary: 3 lights in the distance moving very fast & agile, preforming strange maneuvers.

content.detailedDescription: While observing  the night sky over vashon wa.  noticed a star to the south moving  eratioally in sky.  on closer observation many stars were moving at a high rate of speed.  the formation of the big dipper was spinning in a circular motion. second night, gathered friends and took pictures of very simular activities of these lights.  do not know of any object displaying these capabilities.  bright light, high rate of speed, match constellations but apparently in atmosphere of earth.
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Fireball,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: Obeserved lights two nights in a row taking pictures the second night.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving east on interstate 40 between morganton and hickory in north carolina almost near exit 121 this was on wednesday 18th at 4:45 pm.
the first time i noticed it, it was in front of me to my left, thinking nothing of it at that time, just my imagination; it was extremely bright at first metallic like chrome. the shape was cylindrical / oval and it just appeared for a very short period of time ~ 5 sec and disappeared.
this ufo in my estimation about 2000- 3000 feet up at ~45 degrees although it���s difficult to judge.
thinking it was just my imagination only to see on my left again for a very short period of time. this got my attention but it���s difficult to keep an eye on it and drive at the same time.
i had lost it for awhile as i took exit 123 south to highway 321, a few moments later it again appeared for a very short period of time. then i began to think it���s following me home.
2 exits down i too exit 41 (river road) and that was the last time i saw it.
content.summary: A ufo followed me home

content.detailedDescription: I was at the westland festival for the fireworks with some friends. we live very close to the park where they have the festival so we just walk there. my old sub division has a sidewalk which leads to a path to john glenn highschool which is right across the street from the fireworks. so after the fireworks were over, we go down that path to go back to my sub division. there is a couple baseball diamonds on the path. i had some old fireworks that i blew up on the path and afterwards we were hanging out on the bleachers out there. while im looking out for fireworks in the sky i notice that theres something strange ascending i can see it come up from far away from behind a building and it was moving really slow. it starts to head my way so i point it out and ask my friends what it is. they have no explanation for it either. its sort of just gliding through the sky very slowly and it flys over our heads and behind us until we cant see it anymore because the treeline blocks our view. well i look in that direction that it came from and theres another ascending and it follows the exact path that the other one did. once we cant see it anymore another one is rising up like they had perfect syncronization and its coming towards us, so i stop some teens walking down the path and ask them what they think it is and they dont have a clue either. so when i cant see it anymore heres another one rising up and i tried to record it on my phone but it didnt work because it was dark outside. this keeps on happening im not sure exactly how many there were but i know there were at least 6. they all follow the exact same path fly at the same speed and glow the same color. i couldnt make out any shapes but the appeard to be oval and they just stayed a solid reddish orange color and were perfectly silent. if i had to guess how big they were its hard to say, but probably about 15ft across and im guessing the altitude is about 3-4x the tree lines height. i know that they werent balloons with candles, flares, fireworks or planes. i grew up near selfridge airbase so i know what planes and choppers look like at night and how they move and they dont even compare to what we saw that night.
content.summary: Bright orange/reddish objects ascending straight up then following a staight horizontal path very slowly

content.detailedDescription:
This was not witnessed but discovered on the camera card that was taken out of the digital trail camera when it was taken home to be viewed on the computer.The trail camera had taken hundreds of pictures from this same location all hours of the day & night. this was the only time anything was captured on camera other than wildlife. it was in the paulding forest game preserve. there are no houses or people near where the camera was located and you can see from day time photos there is a pretty good tree canopy that blocks the sky. we have a series of 13 images one of which is a daytime shot to show the tree cover. i would like to submit them all for you to take a look at the sequence & movement of the object.Please contact me so that i may know how to send all the digital files.

thank you.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Attached photos were taken with a digital trail camera. it had been on the same tree for over 2 wks.

content.detailedDescription: I take pictures sometimes of clouds when a storm comes in or when the sky looks unusual for screen savers for my computer . was zooming in on some pics i took in the summer and had to send this one in .It shows a vehicle in the sky just above the house ,didn't know it was there till i zoomed in on it with windows picture viewer .It looked like it has a couple of different lighting features. i thought maybe a plane but it doesn't look like a plane to me .You are going to have to zoom in just above the roof in the center of the pic to see it.
content.summary: Was going through some pics i took last year and seen a object in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd by phone: 

"i was leaving a restaurant at 85th and wornall rd. in kansas city at 5:15 p.M. and was looking at some very strange egg-carton like clouds when something shiny caught my eye.  i saw a cluster of approximately 25 perfectly round silver metallic speheres flying to the east of my position at 45-degrees off the horizon and at least 1,000 feet altititude.  the sun was setting and shone off of these spheres.  the objects were in a large circular shotgun pattern, but as they moved away from me they got closer together and into a tight formation. they then moved into the strange clouds and dissapeared from view. it would take a garbage can lid held at arms length to cover these objects all at once at the point where i first saw them. these objects moved silently in a type of wave, undulating through the sky. the objects were definatley not birds. i have spent a lot of time in the wilderness and am a hunter, and these were not like snow geese, canada geese, or any type of bird ive ever seen.  ive also never seen conventional aircraft like this. i was alone and did not have a camera with me, but from now on plan to have a camera on my person at all times.  i am college educationed, own and operate two businesses and am not prone to halucinations. ive never seen anything like this and would like to know what they were."
content.summary: 25 metallic spheres flying over kansas city

content.detailedDescription: It was 10:40pm, the dog wanted to go out, as i opened the patio door which faces west, comeing over the top of the house from the east, a bright redish-orange orb, sphere, ball shape, about 8-9 inches in diameter with a tracer tail "stopped" 22 feet in front of me at around 7.5 feet above the ground and then blinked out. it really scared me! i slammed the door shut and went running for my husband, i have no idea what it was, but it was to close for comfort. needless to say, he had to let the dog back in.
content.summary: Redish-orange sphere to close for comfort.

content.detailedDescription: I am reporting this for my daughters boyfriend. he was exiting from a park he had been at with some friends, before pulling out onto the main road he noticed a bright light off in the distance (nw). he told me that he thought it was just a helicopter and didnt think much of it, until in a instant, the craft was right above him as he was driving down the road (heading e), at that moment he observed that the craft was triangler in shape and had three bright white lights at all three corners with one red light that was blinking in the middle towards the back of the craft inbetween two of the bright white lights, after observing the craft it proceeded off to the east.
content.summary: Triangle shaped craft 100ft above car.
